CustomField.description: Apply an extra filter into a parent query to process only when there are recently created or last modified child records in a rollup operation, narrowing the data scope and improving job execution efficiency. Apply this for rollup operations where the parent value relies on the most recently created or modified child records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Apply an extra filter into a parent query to process only when there are recently created or last modified child records in a rollup operation, narrowing the data scope and improving job execution efficiency. Apply this for rollup operations where the parent value relies on the most recently created or modified child records.
CustomField.label: Additional Dynamic Filter

value.fullName: Child Records Created In Last X Minutes
value.label: Child Records Created In Last X Minutes

value.fullName: Child Records Modified In Last X Minutes
value.label: Child Records Modified In Last X Minutes

value.fullName: Child Records Created Or Modified In Last X Minutes
value.label: Child Records Created Or Modified In Last X Minutes
